name: Blue Pointsettia Felt Christmas Stocking
description:
***2013 Edition Christmas Stocking***
**FUN***COLORFUL***ECO-FRIENDLY***CHRISTMAS ***STOCKINGS**


***Pointsettia stockings are available in these colors: red, green, blue, charcoal, fushia, purple stocking body with white flowers and white stocking body with red flowers.

*Perfect size for small stocking stuffers or for decoration

*11 1/2" long from top of stocking to bottom edge of stocking under toe x 6” wide across top of stocking approximately (not including length of the loop)
*Handmade with care in a pet free, smoke free studio
*Made from 100% recycled felt...that used to be plastic bottles!

******Please contact me if you would like more than one stocking or different color combination. I will place a custom order listing in my store for you. 

****Order before November 30 to guarantee receipt before Christmas day.

Thanks so much for visiting Stitcholicious!
****All stocking designs copyright 2013 Stitcholicious

name: Pet Paw Christmas Stocking - Charcoal
description:
***2013 Edition Christmas Stocking***
**FUN***COLORFUL***ECO-FRIENDLY***CHRISTMAS ***STOCKINGS**


***Pet paw stockings are available in these colors: red, green, blue, charcoal, fushia, purple stocking body and paw with white cuff, toe and heel patches.

*Perfect size for small stocking stuffers or for decoration

*11 1/2" long from top of stocking to bottom edge of stocking under toe x 6” wide across top of stocking approximately (not including length of the loop)
*Handmade with care in a pet free, smoke free studio
*Made from 100% recycled felt...that used to be plastic bottles!

******Please contact me if you would like more than one stocking or different color combination. I will place a custom order listing in my store for you.
